name: Cisco - Meraki - REST
useCases: Onboard, update, manage or remove Devices

assets.name: Create Network - Meraki - REST
assets.overview: This is a modular workflow that automates the creation of a new network.
assets.exampleInput:
{
  "adapterId": "Meraki",
  "networkName": "Test Network",
  "timeZone": "America/Denver",
  "tags": [
    "tag1",
    "tag2"
  ],
  "productTypes": [
    "appliance",
    "camera",
    "cellularGateway",
    "sensor",
    "switch",
    "systemsManager",
    "wireless"
  ],
  "notes": "Notes to associate with the created network",
  "organizationName": "Organization"
}

assets.name: Claim Network Devices - Meraki - REST
assets.overview: This is a modular workflow that automates the process of claiming a new network device.

adapters.name: adapter-meraki
adapters.configurationNotes: In order to run the workflows in this Pre-Built Automation, the adapter property choosepath must be added to the Meraki adapter configuration with value `"v1"`.

exampleProjects.name: Cisco - Meraki - REST - Example
exampleProjects.webName: Cisco Meraki Example Use Cases for Device Provisioning
exampleProjects.overview: This Pre-Built Automation bundle contains several example use cases that are applicable when Itential Automation Platform is integrated with a Cisco Meraki controller using the REST API
